channel.title: Need help on what npc's say
channel.description:
hey im on satans isle v1 and i want frogprincess to say im the owner
and aldo when i log in on the chatscreen how do i make it say ownerhas logged in

item.title: Need help on what npc's say
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

go to npchandler search for moo and add this under it
change the ids to waht you want and add your name

else if (npcs[i].npcType == npc id) { if (misc.random2(10) <= 3) //this is the time delay { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; if (PlayerHandler.isPlayerOn("name")) { npcs[i].textUpdate = "owner name is ONLINE"; } else { npcs[i].textUpdate = "owner name is OFFLINE"; } } }[br][size=1]Posted on: August 05, 2007, 08:19:46 PM[/size][hr]hope it helps

Read full topic
item.source: Need help on what npc's say

item.title: Need help on what npc's say
item.dc:creator: @P_16 P 16
item.description:
@P_16 wrote:

im gonna tell u one step! u figure out the rest

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2862) { if (misc.random2(25) == 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = ("Go though the portal and get out of my site!"); } }

post that in npc handler figure out how u change the npc type, where to put it, and how to change the wrighting
